name: Grid Block
description:
Grid Block is a PC game made for the 2021 Epic Mega Jam!

Use the mouse to click on blocks, either horizontally or vertically,  to try and take as many as possible. You win by taking the last block but be careful not to block yourself in!

Try to get the highest score by taking over all the blocks. You can go back over your own blocks and also take out the computer's blocks!
